local_intent: Transfer phase: detect red_plate, move above it, align, lower until contact, place using place_pose, release and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is held in the gripper (pick succeeded earlier)
place_pose blackboard key was set earlier in the global tree
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer steps in the GLOBAL_BT: ensure red plate is visible, position above it, align, perform contact-guided lowering and place at the previously stored place_pose, then open gripper and retreat.
